column22: comment:"Oven was very well packed and despatched on time.  Not delivered! Had to go and collect it myself from Leopards courier office coz they were making lame excuses to deliver at my door step.  Used the product for over a month. Works fine. Thermostat not very accurate. Better to get a separate thermostat and place it in the oven for better cooking. Otherwise the oven works as advertised and is good value for the money spent. Fully satisfied.  One small word for Dawlance people: the user manual mentions settings for PORK. No harm in copying manuals but at least delete things that are objectionable for the local population."}

column74: comment:"It is good oven and working good but wrong size advertisement. it cannot make 15 inch pizza. even 14 inch pan fits edge to edge. at maximum
column75: only 13 inch pan fits comfortably. in recipe book the suggested pizza size is 10 to 12 inch
column76: so 15 inch is wrongly advertised. also there is difference in baking suggestion in the manual and recipe book so we dont know which to follow. for example manual suggests to bake cake by top rod only. but recipe book suggests to use both set of rods with convection fan. insulation at front door can also be improved as i noted lot of heat loss front front side door. the dimensions of this 4215 oven are exactly same as told by dawlance for 2515 oven and the pizza size suggested in recipe books of both 4215 and 2515 oven is same i.e. 10 to 12 inch. so i dont know
column77: how this is possible. however oven works and bakes good and i got good deal."}
